skills.name: access-locked-out
skills.description: Restore access for customers who are locked out of their account or courses. Use when a paying customer cannot log in, access materials, or restore purchases.

skills.name: api-documentation-question
skills.description: Answer API and technical documentation questions. Use when a customer asks about API usage, code implementation, or integration details.

skills.name: app-crash-report
skills.description: Customer reporting application crashes, missing exercises, broken features, StackBlitz issues, or other technical problems with the course platform.

skills.name: broken-link-404-error
skills.description: Address broken links and missing resources. Use when a customer reports a 404 or a link to course or website content is not working.

skills.name: certificate-request
skills.description: Provide guidance on completion certificates. Use when a customer asks for a course certificate or LinkedIn certificate details.

skills.name: cohort-access-request
skills.description: Help with access to cohort materials and recordings. Use when a customer cannot find or access cohort content, workshop materials, or live session recordings.

skills.name: cohort-schedule-inquiry
skills.description: Share cohort schedule information. Use when a customer asks about dates, timing, or when the next cohort starts.

skills.name: content-feedback
skills.description: Customer providing feedback about course content including suggestions for improvements, typo corrections, error reports in exercises or solutions, and feature requests for content.

skills.name: continuing-education-credits
skills.description: Respond to CEU or professional credit inquiries. Use when a learner asks whether a course qualifies for continuing education credits.

skills.name: corporate-invoice
skills.description: Handle corporate invoice and reimbursement requests. Use when a customer needs an invoice, VAT or tax info, or documentation for company reimbursement.

skills.name: course-content-locked
skills.description: Restore access to purchased course content. Use when a customer has paid but content is locked, missing, or inaccessible.

skills.name: course-difficulty-concern
skills.description: Advise on course difficulty and prerequisites. Use when a customer is unsure about the level or required knowledge.

skills.name: discount-code-request
skills.description: Respond to discount or coupon requests. Use when a customer asks for a promo code or special pricing.

skills.name: duplicate-purchase
skills.description: Resolve duplicate purchases. Use when a customer bought the same course or license twice or was charged twice.

skills.name: email-change
skills.description: Transfer licenses to a new email address. Use when a customer wants to change account email, move a license, or update access after a job change.

skills.name: email-delivery-failure
skills.description: Handle email delivery failures. Use when messages bounce or a customer reports not receiving emails.

skills.name: event-sponsorship-request
skills.description: Handle event sponsorship inquiries. Use when organizers ask for sponsorship or support for conferences or hackathons.

skills.name: gift-purchase-option
skills.description: Guide gift purchases. Use when a customer wants to buy a course for someone else.

skills.name: installment-payment-option
skills.description: Answer payment plan questions. Use when a customer asks about installments or split payments for a course.

skills.name: invoice-billing-statement
skills.description: Provide receipts and billing statements. Use when a customer needs an invoice, receipt, or payment confirmation for a completed purchase.

skills.name: learning-path-guidance
skills.description: Recommend learning paths. Use when a customer asks which courses to take and in what order.

skills.name: lesson-content-question
skills.description: Answer lesson-specific content questions. Use when a customer asks about a lesson, code example, or concept in a course.

skills.name: login-link
skills.description: Provide login link help. Use when a customer cannot access courses and requests a login link or access email.

skills.name: media-press-outreach
skills.description: Handle media and press outreach. Use when journalists or podcast producers request interviews, features, or press information.

skills.name: nonprofit-government-discount
skills.description: Respond to nonprofit or government discount requests. Use when an organization asks about special pricing for nonprofit, education, or government.

skills.name: outdated-course-content
skills.description: Handle reports of outdated course content. Use when a customer says material is old or no longer matches current technology.

skills.name: partnership-collaboration-inquiry
skills.description: Handle partnership and collaboration inquiries. Use when a third party asks about partnerships, promotions, or collaborations.

skills.name: password-reset-issue
skills.description: Help with password resets and account recovery. Use when a customer cannot reset their password or access their account.

skills.name: payment-method-issue
skills.description: Resolve payment method problems. Use when a customer has trouble paying with a card, Apple Pay, or a regional payment option.

skills.name: ppp-pricing
skills.description: Explain Purchasing Power Parity pricing. Use when a customer asks about PPP, regional pricing, affordability, or discount stacking.

skills.name: price-feedback
skills.description: Customer expressing concerns about pricing, affordability, regional pricing issues, or requesting discounts. Often from freelancers, individual developers paying out of pocket, or users in regions with unfavorable exchange rates.

skills.name: pricing-inquiry
skills.description: Answer pricing questions for courses. Use when a customer asks about current price, pricing model, or availability.

skills.name: refund-request
skills.description: Handle refund requests. Use when a customer asks for a refund, money back, or to cancel a purchase or subscription.

skills.name: scholarship-financial-aid
skills.description: Customer requesting free access due to financial hardship, sanctions, or being a student who cannot afford the course. Common from users in sanctioned countries (Iran, Afghanistan, Russia) or students on limited budgets.

skills.name: security-vulnerability-report
skills.description: Respond to security vulnerability reports. Use when a researcher reports a security issue or asks about bug bounty policy.

skills.name: student-discount-request
skills.description: Respond to student discount inquiries. Use when a student or academic asks about educational pricing.

skills.name: subscription-renewal-issue
skills.description: Resolve subscription renewal and charge issues. Use when a customer reports an unexpected renewal, charge, or missing renewal notice.

skills.name: team-license-purchase
skills.description: Handle team and bulk license purchases. Use when an organization asks to buy multiple licenses for a team.

skills.name: technical-issue-course-content
skills.description: Troubleshoot technical issues with course materials. Use when a customer reports video, code, or content not working.

skills.name: two-factor-auth-issue
skills.description: Help with two-factor authentication problems. Use when a customer cannot get a 2FA code or device verification.

skills.name: ui-ux-feedback
skills.description: Capture UI and UX feedback plus feature requests. Use when a customer shares design feedback or asks for product changes.

skills.name: website-bug-report
skills.description: Handle website bug reports. Use when a customer reports site errors or platform issues.

skills.name: workshop-attendance-confirmation
skills.description: Send workshop attendance confirmations. Use when a customer needs confirmation, calendar invites, or attendance details.

skills.name: workshop-cancellation-notice
skills.description: Notify about workshop cancellations. Use when a scheduled workshop or session is canceled or rescheduled.

skills.name: workshop-technical-setup
skills.description: Help with workshop technical setup. Use when a customer asks about required setup, tools, or preparation.
